=== About Me ===

'''Dmitry N. Agafonov'''

I was born in October, 1976. I live in <nowiki>[[https://maps.google.com/?ie=UTF8&ll=51.545054,45.984993&spn=0.178923,0.429153&z=12|Saratov, Russia]]</nowiki>.

I am a software engineer with hardware in mind, scientist and computer-addicted person. Community and project driving has became my recent hobby and work.

=== Contributions ===

'''2007, February :''' Registered at Russian Ubuntu support forum. Switched myself (from RH-based distro) and 6 company desktop computers (from XP) to Ubuntu.

'''2007, June :''' Proposed new (the first actually) home page design for ubuntu.ru which was on-line till 2012.

'''2007, October :''' Became ubuntu.ru webmaster, system and forum administrator.
